results.name: Smallest k such that 2^k contains three adjacent copies of n in its decimal expansion.
comment: The multi-digit generalization of A171242. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 06 2015
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Popular Computing (Calabasas, CA), Two Tables, Vol. 1, (No. 9, Dec 1973), page PC9-16.
mathematica: Table[k = 0; While[! SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[2^k], Flatten[ConstantArray[IntegerDigits[n], 3]]] > 0, k++]; k, {n, 0, 50}] (* _Robert Price_, May 17 2019 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 18 2015
ext: More terms from _Chai Wah Wu_, Jun 18 2015
